snippet: In 1984, news reports that hundreds of children had been abused at a California preschool helped spread panic across the nation. Despite a lack of convictions , the impact of the case continues to be felt.
abstract: In 1984, news reports that hundreds of children had been abused at a California preschool helped spread panic across the nation. Despite a lack of convictions , the impact of the case continues to be felt.

headline.main: Remembering the Preschool Trial That Launched an Era of Hysteria
